title: Mirage
shortDescription: Atmospheric puzzle game in Unity. Developed complex environment interactions and cutscene systems.

details.overview: Mirage takes place inside the protagonist's home, which contains two unique, environment-based puzzles. The player is able to move and look around, as well as interact with certain objects in their environment to uncover the story.
details.role: Gameplay Programmer, Level Designer, Technical Artist
contributions: Created cutscenes for player interaction using Unity Timeline.
Designed the interior environment for the game.
Collaborated with teammates to develop puzzles in game.
Created a sell sheet for the game.

longFormContent.content: The game consists of two puzzles in which the second one requires the player to turn on a series of switches in a correct sequence. To inform the player that the switch was successful, I decided to use cutscenes.
